name: BIN: The Rise of Binman
description:
BIN: The Rise of Binman is a collaborative project contributed to by:

Wingus (me), IV, IvanezRus, Inrozxa, Kazmic, Nevermaker, ZLD and Optimisto. Links to other pages provided.

Story: 

Binman, also known as Bin, is a simple man. A past-astronaut who wants to get his dickpics off of a NASA supercomputer. In a freak accident, the "spontaneous teleportation" switch is pulled, and Binman is sentenced to traverse many different areas of time and space in order to return to his homeworld and finish the job.

Features:

We have managed to manipulate RPG Maker in ways not previously known possible.

  • A completely random map selection process!
  • 50+ maps containing events from mini-games, to combat, and more!
  • An OST barring 6 custom songs, along with like 50 others!
  • A grand total of 7 party members, with a unique way to manage them.
  • Loads of map variety! Eight individuals who each brought their own unique ideas, concepts, and skillset to the table.
  • Mini-games from extremely esoteric to extremely gimmicky!
  • A recurring and unforgettable main villain!
  • Binman's signature move, the PSYCHOWAVE!
  • And much more!
What else?!

BIN, while being very short, is also very replayable. Out of the 55 custom maps made for the game, you only access about 40 of them during a single playthrough. 

Essentially; going through the game to see what you missed is encouraged! There's a lot in this project you wouldn't want to miss.

Regardless; enjoy the product!

Any critique/comments/concerns/fanart (or if you just want to say hello) can be sent to spoonlordswinguss@gmail.com. Or ivbusnes@gmail.com to reach my partner in crime
